S02n208:9: tasmai namaskṛtvā idamāryāvalokiteśvaramukhodgīrṇaṃ vajradharamahīyaṃ hayagrīvaṃ nāma paramahṛdayamāvartayiṣyāmi [sa]rvakarmārthasādhakam |
S02n208:11: amoghaṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ viṣāṇāṃ ca nāśakam | tadyathā
S02n208:12: om tarula tarula vi[ta]rula vi[ta]rula sarvaviṣaghātaka jvalitavisphuliṅgāṭṭahāsa kesarāṭopapravṛddhavega vajrakhuranirghātaka calitavasudhātala niḥsvasitahasitamārutotkṣiptadharaṇīdhara parabhṛtagaṇasamūhavikṣobhaṇakara paravidyāsaṃbhakṣaṇakara sarvagrāhotsādanakara paramaśāntikarasarvagrahapraśamanakara budhya budhya dhāva dhāva ca bhagavā hayagrīva khāda khāda pa[ramaṃ]trām |
S02n208:13: rakṣa rakṣa kṣamasva kṣamasva sa mayābhihitāṃ mantrām |
S02n208:15: ghorapiśāca sarvagraheṣvapratihato mama varavajradaṃṣṭra kiṃ cirāpayasi |
S02n208:16: idaṃ duṣṭagrahaṃ duṣṭasattvaṃ duṣṭapiśācaṃ vā dhuna [dhuna vidhuna] vidhuna kampa kampa matha matha pramatha pramatha |
S02n208:17: tathāgatājñāṃ pālaya buddhadharmasaṃghānujñātaṃ me karma śīghraṃ kuru kuru mā vilamba |
S02n208:18: hayagrī[vā]ya phaṭ vajrakhurāya phaṭ vajradaṃṣṭrāya phaṭ vajradaṃṣṭrotkaṭabhayabhairavāya phaṭ |
S02n208:26: yāvanto mama [ye kecit] ahitaiṣiṇastān sarvān vaḍavāmukhena nikṛntaya phaṭ |
S02n208:28: sidhyantu mama maṃtrapadā hayagrīvo bhagavān ājñā[pa]yati svāhā |
S02n208:29: ayaṃ hayagrīvavidyā rājā paṭhitasiddhaḥ upacāraḥ ātmarakṣājāpena pararakṣā paṃcaraṃgīsūtram ekaviṃśatigranthayaḥ kṛtvā bandhitavyam |
S02n208:32: sarvaparakṛtā maṃtrāśchinnā bhavanti sarvaśatravastambhanaṃ manasā vyavahāre sva[-]kham mukhe kṛtvā vidyā japtayā uttarāyati |
S02n208:33: spṛṣṭāveśane[ṣu]snātaṃ śucivastraprāvṛtaṃ śucau pradeśe sumanasā[saṃ]baddhā āveśaye śuklavaliryathālaṃbhena |
S02n208:34: candragrahe sūryagrahe ghṛtaṃ tāmrabhājane kṛtvā tāvajjepadyāvaccandro mukto bhavati taṃ ghṛtaṃ pive medhāvī bhavati ekenoddeśena ślokaśatamudgṛṇhāti |
S02n208:46: bhasmanā sarṣapeṇa udakena sapta japtena rakṣā kartavyā |
